learning_objectives.description: Give upper and lower bounds for data rounded to a specified accuracy.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. write down the upper bound of a length measured correct to the nearest metre.

learning_objectives.description: Find upper and lower bounds of the results of calculations which have used data rounded to a specified accuracy.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Example calculations include: calculate the upper bound of the perimeter or the area of a rectangle given dimensions measured to the nearest centimetre; find the lower bound of the speed given rounded values of distance and time.
